title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3695/85 of 23 December 1985 fixing the amount of the carry-over premium for certain fishery products for the 1986 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 3695/85
of 23 December 1985
fixing the amount of the carry-over premium for certain fishery products for the 1986 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1986 fishing year, the carry-over premium for the products listed in Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 2203/82 shall be as indicated in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1986.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 379, 31. 12. 1981, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 340, 28. 12. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 235, 10. 8. 1982, p. 4.
(4) See page 35 of this Official Journal.
ANNEX
Amount of the premium
